<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- SILoadStoreOptimizer.cpp -------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass tries to fuse DS instructions with close by immediate offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will fuse operations such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ds&#95;read&#95;b32 v0, v2 offset:16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ds&#95;read&#95;b32 v1, v2 offset:32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ==&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ds&#95;read2&#95;b32 v&#91;0:1&#93;, v2, offset0:4 offset1:8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The same is done for certain SMEM and VMEM opcodes, e.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;buffer&#95;load&#95;dword s4, s&#91;0:3&#93;, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;buffer&#95;load&#95;dword s5, s&#91;0:3&#93;, 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ==&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;buffer&#95;load&#95;dwordx2 s&#91;4:5&#93;, s&#91;0:3&#93;, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass also tries to promote constant offset to the immediate by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjusting the base. It tries to use a base from the nearby instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allows it to have a 13bit constant offset and then promotes the 13bit offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;movk&#95;i32 s0, 6144</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;add&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v0, vcc, s0, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;addc&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v1, vcc, 0, v6, vcc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;movk&#95;i32 s0, 4096</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;add&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v5, vcc, s0, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;addc&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v6, vcc, 0, v6, vcc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  global&#95;load&#95;dwordx2 v&#91;5:6&#93;, v&#91;5:6&#93;, off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  global&#95;load&#95;dwordx2 v&#91;0:1&#93;, v&#91;0:1&#93;, off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  s&#95;movk&#95;i32 s0, 4096</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;add&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v5, vcc, s0, v2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  v&#95;addc&#95;co&#95;u32&#95;e32 v6, vcc, 0, v6, vcc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  global&#95;load&#95;dwordx2 v&#91;5:6&#93;, v&#91;5:6&#93;, off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  global&#95;load&#95;dwordx2 v&#91;0:1&#93;, v&#91;5:6&#93;, off offset:2048</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Future improvements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - This is currently missing stores of constants because loading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   the constant into the data register is placed between the stores, although</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   this is arguably a scheduling problem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Live interval recomputing seems inefficient. This currently only matches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   one pair, and recomputes live intervals and moves on to the next pair. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   would be better to compute a list of all merges that need to occur.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - With a list of instructions to process, we can also merge more. If a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cluster of loads have offsets that are too large to fit in the 8-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   offsets, but are close enough to fit in the 8 bits, we can add to the base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pointer and use the new reduced offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siloadstoreoptimizer-h">SILoadStoreOptimizer.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpu-h">AMDGPU.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">llvm/Analysis/AliasAnalysis.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrReg&#91;i&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/disassembler/mipsdisassembler-cpp/#a15b5b86944f6df97d2c3659d77f51f91">getReg</a>() != AddrRegNext.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasMergeableAddress(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;MRI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumAddresses; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;AddrOp = AddrReg&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Immediates are always OK.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t try to merge addresses that aren&#39;t either immediates or registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Should be possible to merge FrameIndexes and maybe some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AddrOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We should be able to merge instructions with other physical reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addresses too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddrOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#affdbf5b92ed7e01352e2f39466efbe21">isPhysical</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">            AddrOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() != AMDGPU::SGPR&#95;NULL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If an address has only one use then there will be no other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions with the same address, so we can&#39;t merge this one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MRI.hasOneNonDBGUse(AddrOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GLOBAL loads and stores are classified as FLAT initially. If both combined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions are FLAT GLOBAL adjust the class to GLOBAL&#95;LOAD or GLOBAL&#95;STORE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If either or both instructions are non segment specific FLAT the resulting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combined operation will be FLAT, potentially promoting one of the GLOBAL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations to FLAT.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For other instructions return the original unmodified class.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the value in the inclusive range &#91;Lo,Hi&#93; that is aligned to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// highest power of two. Note that the result is well defined for all inputs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// including corner cases like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if Lo == Hi, return that value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if Lo == 0, return 0 (even though the &quot;- 1&quot; below underflows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - if Lo &gt; Hi, return 0 (as if the range wrapped around)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029" lineLink="#a0b1d05d2a6d12d964774cb004c9d73b5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#a0b1d05d2a6d12d964774cb004c9d73b5">mostAlignedValueInRange</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3d063b3cfffeac6b26118598d1f8413">maskLeadingOnes&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> - 1) ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>) + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XXX - Would the same offset be OK? Is there any reason this would happen or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be useful?</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI.InstClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7a9230b01226bae0bedf0bbaba0670baca">TBUFFER&#95;LOAD</a> || CI.InstClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7aeae77549e330ba3f182baf3d4143caf3">TBUFFER&#95;STORE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Info0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/amdgpu/gcnbufferformatinfo/#a0675d44d3f636f6152c2f929e346a745">BitsPerComp</a> != Info1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/amdgpu/gcnbufferformatinfo/#a0675d44d3f636f6152c2f929e346a745">BitsPerComp</a> ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Should be possible to support more formats, but if format loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are not dword-aligned, the merged load might not be valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Info0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/amdgpu/gcnbufferformatinfo/#a0675d44d3f636f6152c2f929e346a745">BitsPerComp</a> != 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ac0fad29d70082a9b0c42d96674cc9e56">getBufferFormatWithCompCount</a>(CI.Format, CI.Width + Paired.Width, STI) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t EltOffset0 = CI.Offset / CI.EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t EltOffset1 = Paired.Offset / CI.EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CI.UseST64 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CI.BaseOff = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle all non-DS instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((CI.InstClass != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7a66dbbc43923dc01b699168dd03268f22">DS&#95;READ</a>) &amp;&amp; (CI.InstClass != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7a3493feb96a33a365ee4f23f07354721a">DS&#95;WRITE</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltOffset0 + CI.Width != EltOffset1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">            EltOffset1 + Paired.Width != EltOffset0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI.CPol != Paired.CPol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI.InstClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7a4700b9d4628af721191c8175a6d451d4">S&#95;LOAD&#95;IMM</a> || CI.InstClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7ab15fea60c6ebc0b100637d2f328a7dcd">S&#95;BUFFER&#95;LOAD&#95;IMM</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CI.InstClass == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-siloadstoreoptimizer-cpp-/#a9cdba213ffd6154673089cc93fc01ab7a23cc9b82a472c3f9d8647fe0de81fb94">S&#95;BUFFER&#95;LOAD&#95;SGPR&#95;IMM</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reject cases like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   dword + dwordx2 -&gt; dwordx3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   dword + dwordx3 -&gt; dwordx4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we tried to combine these cases, we would fail to extract a subreg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the result of the second load due to SGPR alignment requirements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI.Width != Paired.Width &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (CI.Width &lt; Paired.Width) == (CI.Offset &lt; Paired.Offset))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the offset in elements doesn&#39;t fit in 8-bits, we might be able to use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the stride 64 versions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((EltOffset0 % 64 == 0) &amp;&amp; (EltOffset1 % 64) == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(EltOffset0 / 64) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(EltOffset1 / 64)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Modify) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.Offset = EltOffset0 / 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Paired.Offset = EltOffset1 / 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.UseST64 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the new offsets fit in the reduced 8-bit range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(EltOffset0) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(EltOffset1)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Modify) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.Offset = EltOffset0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Paired.Offset = EltOffset1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to shift base address to decrease offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Min = std::min(EltOffset0, EltOffset1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a81a0fae24e6bdfe240da4249a8da5978a6a061313d22e51e0f25b7cd4dc065233">Max</a> = std::max(EltOffset0, EltOffset1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79dff91526e31b1a05f59eed6c189eb4">maskTrailingOnes&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(8) &#42; 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((Max - Min) &amp; ~Mask) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Modify) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From the range of values we could use for BaseOff, choose the one that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is aligned to the highest power of two, to maximise the chance that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same offset can be reused for other load/store pairs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t BaseOff = <a href="#a0b1d05d2a6d12d964774cb004c9d73b5">mostAlignedValueInRange</a>(Max - 255 &#42; 64, Min);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy the low bits of the offsets, so that when we adjust them by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subtracting BaseOff they will be multiples of 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BaseOff |= Min &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79dff91526e31b1a05f59eed6c189eb4">maskTrailingOnes&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(6);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.BaseOff = BaseOff &#42; CI.EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.Offset = (EltOffset0 - BaseOff) / 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Paired.Offset = (EltOffset1 - BaseOff) / 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.UseST64 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(Max - Min)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Modify) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From the range of values we could use for BaseOff, choose the one that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is aligned to the highest power of two, to maximise the chance that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same offset can be reused for other load/store pairs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t BaseOff = <a href="#a0b1d05d2a6d12d964774cb004c9d73b5">mostAlignedValueInRange</a>(Max - 0xff, Min);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.BaseOff = BaseOff &#42; CI.EltSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CI.Offset = EltOffset0 - BaseOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Paired.Offset = EltOffset1 - BaseOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SILoadStoreOptimizer::widthsFit(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GCNSubtarget &amp;STM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CombineInfo &amp;CI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CombineInfo &amp;Paired) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width = (CI.Width + Paired.Width);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI.InstClass) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Width &lt;= 4) &amp;&amp; (STM.hasDwordx3LoadStores() || (Width != 3));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %HI:vgpr&#95;32, = V&#95;ADDC&#95;U32&#95;e64 %BASE&#95;HI:vgpr&#95;32, 0, killed %c:sreg&#95;64&#95;xexec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Base:vreg&#95;64 =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src0-&gt;isImm())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Offset1 = Src1-&gt;getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BaseHi = &#42;Src0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BaseHi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Addr.Base.HiReg = BaseHi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Addr.Offset = (&#42;Offset0P &amp; 0x00000000ffffffff) | (Offset1 &lt;&lt; 32);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineOperand &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = &#42;TII-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::vaddr);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    processBaseWithConstOffset(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>, MAddr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Visited&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>&#93; = MAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MAddr.Offset == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Failed to extract constant-offset or there are no&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; constant offsets that can be promoted.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  BASE: &#123;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(MAddr.Base.HiReg, TRI) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(MAddr.Base.LoReg, TRI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#125; Offset: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MAddr.Offset &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step2: Traverse through MI&#39;s basic block and find an anchor(that has the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same base-registers) with the highest 13bit distance from MI&#39;s offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g. (64bit loads)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr1 = &amp;a + 4096;   load1 = load(addr1,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr2 = &amp;a + 6144;   load2 = load(addr2,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr3 = &amp;a + 8192;   load3 = load(addr3,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr4 = &amp;a + 10240;  load4 = load(addr4,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr5 = &amp;a + 12288;  load5 = load(addr5,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Starting from the first load, the optimization will try to find a new base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from which (&amp;a + 4096) has 13 bit distance. Both &amp;a + 6144 and &amp;a + 8192</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has 13bit distance from &amp;a + 4096 The heuristic considers &amp;a + 8192</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as the new-base(anchor) because of the maximum distance which can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accommodate more intermediate bases presumably.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step3: move (&amp;a + 8192) above load1. Compute and promote offsets from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (&amp;a + 8192) for load1, load2, load4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr = &amp;a + 8192</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   load1 = load(addr,       -4096)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   load2 = load(addr,       -2048)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   load3 = load(addr,       0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   load4 = load(addr,       2048)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addr5 = &amp;a + 12288;  load5 = load(addr5,  0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &#42;AnchorInst = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemAddress AnchorAddr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t MaxDist = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::min();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, int64&#95;t&gt;</a>, 4&gt; InstsWCommonBase;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineBasicBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getIterator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SITargetLowering &#42;TLI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">SITargetLowering &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(STM-&gt;getTargetLowering());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ( ; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MachineInstr &amp;MINext = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Support finding an anchor(with same base) from store addresses or</span></CodeLine>
